name: Hearthio
tagline: A unified GUI solution for the modern smarthome
body:
### Welcome to Hearthio.
Oh wow!  This is a website.  Cool stuff.

### Stuff!
That's right, we offer stuff!  Lot's and lots of stu-  oh.  Wait.  Hold on.... mmhm..... mmhm.... okay.  Um.  Well I've just gotten word that we do not - in fact - yet offer stuff.  But we will!  Ohhhhh we will!  We will offer so much stuff, your stuff won't even know what to do with its stuff!

### Filler Text
Oh man.  Filler Text.  Filler Text we have plenty of!  Check out all this text!  Text text text text text.  Boy a product would look good here.  How about some samples of a blog?
>...Land. White. Long. Some names are clearly made for puns.
>But, there are a handful of us who struggle for even the longest stretches of creating a name-based pun.
>I have only two that I’ve found in the last 21 years for “Steffey”...

Wow.  That was quite the content.

### MORE Filler Text!
No. Fishing. Way.  You are telling me, we can have EVEN MORE FILLER TEXT??   Well then just fill'er on up!  Give me some more of that sweet sweet textual communication.  Words!  Letters!  Unicode symbols!  We have it all here at Hearthio.net

### Have Feedback?
Too bad.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
